1.title: Love and Secrets
1.plot: Dre and Charli have been dating for six months but have never met in person. When Charli visits Dre in Alabama, she learns he's been hiding a secret about his Ex, but little does Dre know Charlie has been hiding a secret of her own.

2.title: Culture Smash
2.plot: Maria from Sweden, makes a long trip to visit Iyanya in Brooklyn, after dating online for 7 months. Sexually open, Maria starts things off with a bang and invites Lyanya to some kinky sex. Things stall when Lyanya admits to legal issues.

3.title: Broken Promises
3.plot: After 5 years of dating online Jamila meets Bobby for the first time, they both share dark secrets they've kept hidden. After they hash it out and head to Jamila's hometown Bobby must decide if he can be a dad to her special needs son.

4.title: Commit or Quit
4.plot: After six years of dating online, Ken and Ciera meet for the first time. Ciera introduces atheist Ken to her Southern Baptist family, hoping marriage is in their future. But after seeing Ken's life in New York, Ciera has her concerns.

5.title: Love and Basketball
5.plot: Natiece, a college basketball star, has been dating Kansas, for a year and a half but they've never met in person. They both need to come clean about some big secrets, and see if their love can withstand the truth.

6.title: Losing Faith
6.plot: Religious Natalie finally meets Morgan in Denver and he sweeps her off her feet. Trouble hits when Morgan heads to Natalie in Indiana and it becomes clear that he hasn't been honest about himself which forces Natalie to make a big choice.

7.title: Secrets and Spies
7.plot: Big city Sunnie visits small town Jake after dating online for 5 months. When Sunnie reveals she is asexual, it forces Jake to question if he can still date her. Later, Sunnie drops another bomb making Jake�۪s choice easier.

imdb.plot outline: For better or for worse, the digital age has revolutionized the way people date. With many people opting to date online, more and more couples have never actually met in person. "Virtually in Love" gives real online couples the chance to log off their computers and meet the person they have been dating face-to-face for the first time. In each episode, the couples travel to the hometowns of their significant others to interact with family and friends and discover the ups and downs of dating in real life. After seeing if their virtual chemistry extends to real-life, the couples must decide whether to stay together or call it quits.
imdb.title: Virtually in Love
plot: "_Virtually in Love_ (qv)" will give young hopeful romantics the opportunity to break away from their computer screen and finally meet the person they have been dating face-to-face.

For better or for worse, the digital age has revolutionized the way people date. With many people opting to date online, more and more couples have never actually met in person. "_Virtually in Love_ (qv)" gives real online couples the chance to log off their computers and meet the person they have been dating face-to-face for the first time. In each episode, the couples travel to the hometowns of their significant others to interact with family and friends and discover the ups and downs of dating in real life. After seeing if their virtual chemistry extends to real-life, the couples must decide whether to stay together or call it quits.
